name: 施陽正
objective: 本科目將由不可壓縮流體在各種流動環境所產生之流體分子流動現象之認識，進而利用各種有關因次群，熟習包含可壓縮流體在內之實際應用上所必須具備之基礎方法；如雷諾數．伯努力方程式等。利用流利基礎分析，流體機械之流場與動力，及管路內流場與壓力之變化。
schedule:
1 Course Outline & Ch 1: Introduction
2 Ch 2: Fluid Statics
3 Ch 3: Elementary Fluid Dynamics-The Bernoulli Equation, I
4 Ch3: The Bernoulli Equation, II & Homework Solution (1)
5 Ch 3: The Bernoulli Equatiion, III & Chapter 4: Fluid Kinematics, I
6 Ch 4: Fluid Kinematics, II & Homework Solution & Review of Exam 1
7 Mid-term, I & Ch 5: Finite Control Volume Analysis, I
8 Ch 5: Finite Control Volume Analysis, II & Home Solution (2)
9 Ch5: Finite Control Volume Analysis, III
10 Ch 6: Differential Analysis of Fluid Flow, I & Home Solution (3)
11 Ch 6: Differential Analysis of Fluid Flow, II
& Homework Solution (4) & Review of Exam II
12 Mid-term, II & Ch 6: Differential Analysis of Fluid Flow, III
13 Ch 7: Similitude, Dimensional Analysis and Modeling
14 Ch 8: Viscous Flow in Pipes, I & Home Solution (5)
15 Ch 8: Viscous Flow in Pipes, II
16 Ch 9: Flow Over Immersed Body, I & Homework Solution (6)
17 Ch 9: Flow Over Immersed Body, II & Review of Final Exam
18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Homework 10%,
Mid-term exams 50% (two, 25% x 2),
Final Exam 40% (Cover all lessons of this class)
注意：缺席達三次者，學期分數扣十分。
作業遲交: (1) 當天18:00以前交，該作業分數x 80%
(2) 當天18:00以後至隔天18:00以前交，該作業分數x 60%
(3) 隔天18:00以後至一週內交，該作業分數x 40%

遲交作業請交給助教
